message: A single moment of distraction, and chaos takes its form. The potions misalign, their lights flickering before they vanish into shadows. The sequence is shattered. The challenge is lost. You are defeated.

One mistake, one fraction of a second, and everything you built crumbles into the void. The potions flicker out of sync, their glow dimming and fading. The sequence has collapsed. Your defeat is inevitable.
The final misstep. A single miscalculation and the magic dissolves. The potions dim, their light flickering before disappearing into nothing. The sequence has failed. You have fallen.
The smallest of errors, and everything you fought for collapses. The potions flicker, their glow dying before they dissolve into the void. The sequence is broken. The end has come. You are defeated.
